/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -Wall   -shared -Wl,-soname,liblododriver.so.3.0 -o liblododriver.so.3.0.2 CMakeFiles/lododriver.dir/lodo_driver.o liblodo.so.3.0.2 -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lglut -lXmu -lXi ../../libplayercore/libplayercore.so.3.0.2 -lrt ../../libplayerinterface/libplayerinterface.so.3.0.2 ../../libplayercommon/libplayercommon.so.3.0.2 -lpthread -lltdl -ldl -lgsl -lgslcblas -lm -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib64
